```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Load libraries
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(psych)
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)

#Import data
list.files(here("data"))
data <- import(here("data", "rstats_tweets (1).rds"))
```

```{r Commit 4, include=FALSE}
#Create new dataset
data4 <- data %>% 
                select(created_at) %>% 
                mutate(month = round_date(created_at, "month")) %>% 
                filter(month < as_datetime("2019-01-01 00:00:00")) %>% 
                group_by(month) %>% 
                summarize(n = n())

#Reproduce graph
ggplot(data4, aes(x=month, y=n)) + 
       geom_line() +
       geom_smooth()
```
